title: As AI surges in Florida, officials want to establish some boundaries
description: The Florida Legislature will take its first look at a set of bills imposing regulations on artificial intelligence companies this week.
content:
Florida lawmakers are considering new regulations for artificial intelligence, sparking debate between tech companies and consumer advocates.
One proposed bill, SB 482, aims to create an "AI Bill of Rights" focused on protecting children and vulnerab... [4150 chars]

title: As AI surges in Florida, officials want to establish some boundaries
description: The Florida Legislature will take its first look at a set of bills imposing regulations on artificial intelligence companies this week.
content:
The governor wants to prevent Floridians from paying for the energy and water consumed by AI data centers. That language has been placed into another bill.

title: OpenAI CFO defends ads in ChatGPT as ‘strong business model’
description: One of OpenAI's top executives defended the company's addition of ads to its popular chatbot ChatGPT as a way to democratize access to artificial intelligence.
content:
By Yazhou Sun, Bloomberg
One of OpenAI’s top executives defended the company’s addition of ads to its popular chatbot ChatGPT as a way to democratize access to artificial intelligence.

title: AI company Eightfold sued for helping companies secretly score job seekers
description: Eightfold AI, a venture capital-backed artificial intelligence hiring platform ​used by Microsoft , PayPal and many other Fortune 500 companies, is being sued in California for ‌allegedly compiling reports used to screen job applicants without their knowledge.
content:
Sign up here.
Santa Clara, California-based Eightfold provides tools that promise to speed up the hiring process ‌by assessing job applicants and predicting whether they would be a good fit for a ​job using massive amounts of data from online resumes... [2147 chars]

title: In 'Mercy,' Chris Pratt is on trial with an artificial intelligence judge
